A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Most polarizing movie I have ever seen in my mind...A combination of sheer genius and insane stupidity...Great action movie with major plot holes\, But horrible star wars movie.  Lots of great characters and wonderful acting that were ultimately wasted.  I agree with Mark Hamill when he said he fundamentally disagreed with Luke's character.  Ultimately\, i must go back to my feeling when i left the Theatre.....as awesome of what i saw\, i was......Disappointed.
